Property.name: allowKlonoaMoves
Property.HelpText: Use Klonoa moves for a new gameplay experience. Disable this if you just want a simple Sonic skin.

Property.name: nerfPhysics
Property.HelpText: Enable custom physics to fit Klonoa speed more.

Property.name: useHP
Property.HelpText: Use HP to manage Klonoa life instead of rings, this will force Klonoa objects to show up.

Property.name: hud
Property.HelpText: Display Klonoa hud (only apply when playing Klonoa).

Property.name: obj
Property.HelpText: Replace some objects with their Klonoa counterpart (only apply when playing Klonoa)
